nodes.text: Yarick Tempol was a male Bith who lived during the Galactic Civil War. Circa 1 ABY, he served as the chief of security of the Maulers, a criminal group that operated on Naboo. Tempol was killed during a Royal Marine Regiment operation in the Mauler Stronghold.

Yarick Tempol was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. The game was shut down on December 15, 2011. Yarick Tempol was added to the game as part of the "Legacy Quest" with the release of the "Publish 25", a.k.a. the "New Game Enhancements", on November 15, 2005.
